title: x/blog/from-zero-to-go-launching-on-google: multiple bad link issues
body:
http://blog.golang.org/from-zero-to-go-launching-on-google

issues:
1. http://google-turkey.appspot.com/thumb/20332620 gives internal server error.
2. loadOnce [[http://golang.org/pkg/sync/#Once][sync.Once]] in the program snippet,
i don't know what should we do about links in snippets.
3. the image in performance sections are not displayed inline.
